Text:
Thanks for this one..actually..decent Sci-Fi..

Also..I remember..when I first saw this..on someones Satellite connection..to wit:

"This IS Coming...that IS the Future of penology in America and the World..."

But what I didn't foresee was this kind of not only "Attitude" (including it being "okeedokie" with the Public) but also the "Rationale"..the justification for "Anything Goes" becoming the law of the land.

Fortress America.
